text.text_translated:
The Hunger Games is a big event every year. The Capitol is the government. The country has different parts. In the past, these parts fought the Capitol. The Capitol uses the games to remind the people of this. The games show that the Capitol is in control.

Every year, they choose one boy and one girl from each part of the country. The children are between 12 and 18 years old. They choose the names by chance. The chosen teenagers have a special name. They are called "tributes".

The tributes must fight in a big game. Only one person can live. Everyone in the country must watch the game on TV.

best_attempt.text_translated:
The Hunger Games is a big event every year. The Capitol is the government. It uses the games to punish the districts. The districts are parts of the country. In the past, they fought the Capitol.

Every year, they choose one boy and one girl from each district. The children are between 12 and 18 years old. They choose the names by chance. The chosen teenagers are called "tributes".

The tributes must fight in a big game. Only one person can live. Everyone in the country must watch the game on TV.
